404.title: Error: 404 Not Found
404.message: The webpage you are looking for might have been removed, had it's name changed, or is temporarily unavailable.

auth.createAccount: Don't have an account? Sign Up
auth.updatePasswordError: An error occurred while requesting a password change. Please request the change again. If the problem persists, contact the administrators.
auth.emailSentDescription: An email has been sent to your email address. If you find the email in your inbox with the subject 'Account Recovery,' please check your spam folder.
auth.expiredRequest: No associated password change request was found. This may be because the 1-hour time limit has expired or a new password change request has been made.

validators.passwordLower: Password must have a lowercase letter

validators.nickNameMaxLength: Nickname must be at most {{max}} characters long
